name: Springbokkie
description: The Springbokkie, composed of creme de menthe and Amarula, is a cocktail shooter that is popular in South Africa.
directions: The Crème de menthe is poured into the shot glass and the Amarula is carefully layered on top.
source: By Lorienkee - Own work, CC BY 3.0, https://commons.wikimedia.org/w/index.php?curid=7463016
